text:
If someone has the knowledge to bring it as a template, it will be great.
I'd be happy then try supporting adding a Franklin Plug In to auto generate the backlinks.

elements.text:
If someone has the knowledge to bring it as a template, it will be great.
I'd be happy then try supporting adding a Franklin Plug In to auto generate the backlinks.

text: I'm using a Zettelkasten too but don't get the purpose of backlinks. Why do you find them useful? :slightly_smiling_face: Luhmann was highly effective without an automated system to create them.

elements.text: I'm using a Zettelkasten too but don't get the purpose of backlinks. Why do you find them useful?
Luhmann was highly effective without an automated system to create them.

text:
I have many Math notes which are build one one each other. At some point they are actually shoulder to shoulder.
The backlink shows that. I find it very useable. At the moment I use `Neuron` . But I think the template I mentioned above is way way better experience.
